original_text: He said, “Behold, I will make known to you what shall be at the latter end of the indignation, for it refers to the appointed time of the end.
korean_text: 이르되 진노하시는 때가 마친 후에 될 일을 내가 네게 알게 하리니 이 환상은 정한 때 끝에 관한 것임이라

sentences.original_text: I will make known to you
what shall be at the latter end of the indignation,
sentences.korean_translation: 분노의 마지막 끝에 무엇이 있을 것인지,

sentences.original_text: the appointed time of the end.
